name: stripe-test-cards
title: Stripe Testing - Cards
description: Quickly access Stripe test cards for testing your Stripe integration
author: mk-ryan1988

commands.name: list-test-cards
commands.title: List Test Cards
commands.description: Copy Stripe test cards right from your Spotlight

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
